      • computeNormal

        public static Vector2d computeNormal(Point2d p1,
                                     Point2d p2)
        Compute the vector which is perpendicular to the p1p2 vector
        Parameters:
        p1 - first point
        p2 - second point
        Returns:
        n unit vector where n scalar p1p2 = 0

      • computeNormal

        public static Vector2d computeNormal(Vector2d v)
        Compute the vector which is perpendicular to the v vector
        Parameters:
        v - vector to find normal
        Returns:
        n unit vector where n scalar v = 0

        Compute the norm of a vector
        Parameters:
        v - vector to compute norm
        Returns:
        the vector norm

        Compute the squared norm of a vector
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the vector squared norm

      • intersectionPoint

        public static Point2d intersectionPoint(Point2d p1,
                                        Vector2d v1,
                                        Point2d p2,
                                        Vector2d v2)
        Compute the intersection of 2 lines described by a point and a vector. If there is no or infinite number of intersection, returns null
        Parameters:
        p1 - first line point
        v1 - first line vector
        p2 - second line point
        v2 - second line vector
        Returns:
        the intersection point or null if lines are quite parallel

      • intersectionPoint

        public static Point2d intersectionPoint(Point2d p1,
                                        Vector2d v1,
                                        Point2d p2,
                                        Vector2d v2,
                                        double epsilon)
        Compute the intersection of 2 lines described by a point and a vector. If there is no or infinite number of intersection, returns null
        Parameters:
        p1 - first line point
        v1 - first line vector
        p2 - second line point
        v2 - second line vector
        epsilon - min value of the dot product v1.v2 which tells if lines are intersecting or not
        Returns:
        the intersection point or null if lines are quite parallel

      • isZero

        public static boolean isZero(double x,
                             double epsilon)
        Returns:
        true if x is quite equal to zero ( -eps < x < eps)

      • dot

        public static double dot(Vector2d v1,
                         Vector2d v2)
        Compute the dot product between two vectors
        Parameters:
        v1 - first vector
        v2 - second vector
        Returns:
        v1x * v2x + v1y * v2y

      • cross

        public static double cross(Vector2d v1,
                           Vector2d v2)
        Compute the cross product between two vectors
        Parameters:
        v1 - first vector
        v2 - second vector
        Returns:
        v1x * v2y - v1y * v2x

      • pointOfLine

        public static Point2d pointOfLine(Point2d p,
                                  Vector2d v,
                                  double t)
        Compute a point on a parametric line
        Parameters:
        p - start point of the parametric line
        v - direction vector of the parametric line
        t - parameter value on the line
        Returns:
        a newly created point on the line ( = p + v * t)

      • pointOfLine

        public static Point2d pointOfLine(Point2d p2Fill,
                                  Point2d p,
                                  Vector2d v,
                                  double t)
        Fill the given point with computed coordinates of a point on a parametric line
        Parameters:
        p - start point of the parametric line
        v - direction vector of the parametric line
        t - parameter value on the line
        Returns:
        the given point
